Key Match Events: The Royals must win the next two games to keep their season alive after a 3-2 loss to New York in game 3 of the ALDS.
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals signed Michael Wacha to a one-year deal in December of last year, which is expected to help in this game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals are facing the same Yankees team they ended their 2023 season with a 5-2 win over.
Others: The Royals have a decision to make about Salvador Perez.
